sentence: Speaker, let me first thank Richard Neal, the once  and future chairman of the powerful Ways and Means Committee, as well  as Frank Pallone,  Bobby Scott, all my colleagues in government on the  Democratic side, and the Republicans who have joined us now to make  sure that we extend the Affordable Care Act tax credits which are  scheduled to expire at the end of this month.
